definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: The emboli are divided into 4 kinds according to the shapes.
sentences.chinese: 根据肺动脉内栓子形态分4类。

sentences.english: How many cusps are there supposed to be on this pulmonic valve.
sentences.chinese: 你认为这个肺动脉瓣有多少个瓣叶？

sentences.english: Most commonly the narrowing occurs at the pulmonary valve.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的狭窄部位为肺动脉瓣。

sentences.english: Conclusion The prognosis of PHT secondary to rheumatic diseases is pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 结论风湿性疾病继发肺动脉高压预后不良。

sentences.english: The tumor invades the mediastinum and surrounds and narrows the right pulmonary artery.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤侵犯纵膈和包绕肺动脉，同时肺动脉可见狭窄。

sentences.english: The tumor invades the mediastinum and surrounds and narrows the right pulmonary artery.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤侵犯纵膈和包绕肺动脉，同时肺动脉可见狭窄。

sentences.english: Tell her you're excited to watch her harvest pulmonary valve using her septal-sparing technique.
sentences.chinese: 告诉她你很兴奋能目睹她用间隔分离术获取肺动脉瓣。

sentences.english: In reconstruction of right ventricle to pulmonary outflow tract, aortic homograft were used in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 右心室肺动脉流出道重建，均用同种带瓣主动脉。

sentences.english: The most common causes are aortic or pulmonic valve regurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的原因是主动脉瓣或肺动脉瓣反流。

sentences.english: The hilum is seen at the lower right with radiating pulmonary arteries and bronchi.
sentences.chinese: 右下有肺动脉和支气管的部位是肺门。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the surgical treatment technique of absent pulmonary valve syndrome (APVS).
sentences.chinese: 目的总结肺动脉瓣缺如综合征的外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: Primary pulmonary artery sarcoma is a rare tumor.
sentences.chinese: 摘要肺动脉肉瘤是一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: The different converging pattern of the lingular branch of left pulmonary artery is related to the middle part of left hila.
sentences.chinese: 左肺门中区的形态则取决于左肺动脉舌支的发支情况。

sentences.english: The second grade stenosis plays important roles in PAPS progression.
sentences.chinese: 二级狭窄在肺动脉压力的演变中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: ConclusionFeikang Recipe can improve the function of right heart and lower pulmonary hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 结论肺康方可以改善右心功能，降低肺动脉高压。

sentences.english: We used small atraumatic vascular clamps to control blood flow through the pulmonary and interlobar arteries.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用小的非创伤性血管钳夹住肺动脉及肺问动脉。

definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)
pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
